title: Fight
description: Nickie is still learning to navigate the complexities of this new life. Now that she knows about mating she must deal with Brandon 's insistence that she's his mate, but Nickie knows it isn't true. What will she have to do to convince him? While Nickie deals with the changes in her life, Bill asks her to go to Seattle on pack business. But the trip won't be as easy as expected, can she survive what's headed her way?
author: Melissa Stevens
